name: Summertime Tippling

ingredients.item: Azuñia organic blanco or reposado tequila

preparation:
How do you improve on the combination of cucumber, strawberries, ginger and mint? It’s simple. Add organic tequila, shake it all up and serve it at your next get together.

In a cocktail shaker, muddle the cucumber then add the next four ingredients.

Fill the cocktail shaker with ice and shake for 10 seconds.

Add 1 oz ginger beer to shaker then dump contents into a collins glass or mason jar.

Garnish with the mint sprig and cucumber slice.
